rukus.text: And you are not (engaged) in any affair nor do you read about it from the Quran nor do you execute any work but We are Witnesses over you when you are engaged in it. And not (even) the weight of a particle in the earth or in the sky is hidden from your Lord and nothing less than that nor greater but it is (recorded) in a clear record
Beware ! certainly (for) the friends of God, there will neither be any fear on them nor will they grieve
Those who believe and guard (against evil)
for them is good news in the life of this world and in the hereafter, there is no change in the words of God, that is a great achievement
And do not let their speech grieve you, certainly the might is totally God’s, He is the Hearing, the Knowing

Beware ! whoever is in the skies and whoever is in the earth is certainly God’s, and what do they follow who pray to (their presumed) partners besides God? They follow nothing but conjecture, and they do nothing but lie
He it is Who made the night for you that you may rest therein and the day for visibility, certainly there are signs therein for a people who listen

They say, “God has taken a son,” far it is from His Glory, He is Independent, His is whatever is in the skies and whatever is in the earth, you have no authority with you for this (statement of yours). Do you say about God that which you do not know
Say, “Those who forge a lie against God will not be successful.”
(They have made such activities the source of their) provision in this world, then to Us will be their return, then We will make them taste a severe punishment because they did not believe
